Writing

Open to opportunities

Welcome

My name's Dominic

I'm a Design Director with over 12 years of experience leading product design at startups. From first principles to final pixels, I enjoy solving complex and demanding problems, creating intuitive and empowering products, and helping teams focus on quality.

Season Focus

Exploring the relationship between tools, creators & craft.

Expertise

I love helping companies differentiate through quality

Foundations

I’ve helped companies focus on their differentiator in the market, and define the strategies to help them leverage it. From design principles, product strategies, and feature north stars, I pride myself in using words to inform, guide and empower teams to do their most impactful work.

Execution

I’ve lead a wide range of projects in my career. From first foundations, to full platform redesigns. My expertise is helping companies design and deliver intuitive, empowering and impactful projects to their customers.

Systems

As an executive in early startups, I’ve learned how to design systems that enable scale. Design systems, R&D operations, team practices and weekly rituals — I love helping companies create systems that streamline work, strengthen creative cultures, and optimise for quality.

Futures

I get energised helping companies explore what a big leap forward for their product could look, feel and function like. These help align and rally around where the product is going, help validate directions with customers, and visualise ambitious product strategies.

Experienced in AR to SaaS, and seed to series C

Let's work together

Originally from London, I'm a Design Director with a broad range of experience — with projects across Industrial Design, Augmented Reality, edTech, mobile apps and SaaS products. Most recently I was the VP of Design at Qwilr, Head of Design at Smart Sparrow, and lead the design on multiple Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation projects.
